      • getServerContacts

        public java.util.List<ServerContact> getServerContacts(java.lang.String connectString)
        Get list of server contacts, for servers that this device has connected to, at least once since ATAK startup. Does not reach out to server, rather checks cached contacts
        Parameters:
        connectString - Pass null to get contacts for all servers
        Returns:
        the list of server contacts

      • getContact

        public static ServerContact getContact(java.util.List<ServerContact> contacts,
                                       java.lang.String uid)
        Helper util to find a contact in a list, by UID If multiple callsigns for a given UID, return most recent
        Parameters:
        contacts - the list of contacts
        uid - the uid to search on
        Returns:
        returns the most recent contact that matches the UID.

        Parameters:
        contacts - the list of contacts
        uid - the uid for the contact to look for
